description: Irregular triangular array T read by rows: T(i,0) = T(i,2i) = 1 for i >= 0; T(i,1) = T(i,2i-1) = floor(i/2 + 1) for i >= 1; for even n >= 2, T(i,j) = T(i-1,j-2) + T(i-1,j-1) + T(i-1,j) for j = 2..2i-2; for odd n >= 3, T(i,j) = T(i-1,j-2) + T(i-1,j) for j=2..2i-2.
comments: T(n, k) = number of integer strings s(0)..s(n) such that s(0) = 0, s(n) = n-k, |s(i)-s(i-1)|<=1 if i is even or i = 1, |s(i)-s(i-1)| = 1 if i is odd and i >= 3.
